field.sethelp:
This will prevent Selected IPs from being blocked. Only for IPv4 lists (/32 and /24).
Country blocking lists cannot be suppressed. This will also remove any RFC1918 addresses from all lists.

Alerts can be suppressed using the '+' icon in the Alerts tab and IPs added to the 'pfBlockerNGSuppress' alias A blocked IP in a CIDR other than /32 or /24 will need a 'Whitelist alias' w/ list action: 'Permit Outbound' Firewall rule

Do not use the pfBlockerNGSuppress Alias in a Firewall Rule. This alias is used during the cron download process only.

Firewall Rule logging - Enable Global logging to [ Status: System Logs: FIREWALL Log ].
This overrides any log settings in the Continent/IPv4/6 Alias tabs. (DNSBL not included)
